mapper.insert: insert into DICT_FIELDINFO (FCNAME, FENAME, FCODE, FTYPE, FLENGTH, FDECIMAL, FISNULL, FDEFAULT, FMAX, FMIN, FCHECK, FMEMO, FTABLENAME, FENUM, FPROCEDURE ) values (#{fcname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flength,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fdecimal,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fisnull,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fmin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fcheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fprocedure,jdbcType=BLOB} )
mapper.select: select FCNAME, FENAME, FCODE, FTYPE, FLENGTH, FDECIMAL, FISNULL, FDEFAULT, FMAX, FMIN, FCHECK, FMEMO, FTABLENAME, FENUM, FPROCEDURE from DICT_FIELDINFO
